Updated November     pm



Meijer announced on Tuesday that it has  open positions for a new West Lafayette location PERIOD

The new supercenter located on U.S PERIOD  near Klondike Road is expected to open its doors in either late spring or early summer PERIOD On Tuesday Meijer released a press release describing the positions available ranging from clerks to pharmacy technicians PERIOD According to the release the new store will be a convenient onestop destination for grocery gas and general merchandise. the store is encouraging jobseekers to fill out an application from on its website and will be conducting phone interviews over the next few weeks PERIOD Selected candidates will be able to schedule inperson interview PERIOD Pay will vary by position but every level of employment is guaranteed basic health coverage benefits PERIOD
